scripts.build: bun build index.ts --outdir dist --target node --splitting --minify --external @playwright/test && bunx tsc index.ts --declaration --emitDeclarationOnly --outDir ./dist/types
scripts.pkg: bun run build && bun pm pack
scripts.test: bun run build && bunx playwright test ./playwright-tests/ && bun test tests/*.test.ts
scripts.lint: bunx eslint index.ts && bunx eslint tests && bunx eslint playwright-tests
scripts.format: bunx eslint index.ts --fix && bunx eslint tests --fix && bunx eslint playwright-tests --fix
